tool_description: Ranks multiple diagnostic trouble codes by repair priority considering safety, cost, complexity, and interdependencies between repairs.

repair_costs.description: Estimated repair cost for each code

access_difficulty.description: Repair complexity level for each code

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must contain same number of elements.
Invalid severity levels: Use [critical, high, medium, low] for severity ratings.
Negative costs: Repair costs must be non-negative numbers.
Invalid difficulty levels: Use [easy, moderate, difficult, specialist] for access difficulty.
Invalid time constraint: Use [immediate, urgent, normal, flexible] for time urgency.
usage: Provide matched arrays of codes, severity, costs, and difficulty levels. Optionally set budget and time constraints for prioritization.

priority_ranking.description: Priority order numbers for each DTC (1=highest priority)

recommended_sequence.description: DTCs ordered by recommended repair sequence

priority_reasoning.description: Explanation for each repair's priority ranking

budget_fit.description: Whether each repair fits within budget constraint
